modName: Daejones Saviors Hide Replacer Alternate - Female
summary: Changes the look of the Savior Hide Armor. Darker fur, adds skirt, changes armor slightly.
descriptionHtml:
Simply drag these folders into your Data folder.

To uninstall simply remove the files.
 
---

First off this was originally created by Daejones so all credit goes to him.  The file can be found here:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1620

I simply removed and added some things for my own personal tastes.


I removed the satchel and belt wrap around
I removed the sleeves
I removed a section of the armor in the back and slightly reshaped it

I readded the chain-links to the upper arms
I readded the thorns / spikes to the fur around the neck area
author: MrMojoRisin88
